pcr1i1.name: pcr1i1
pcr1i1.label: You show your child with words and gestures that you like him/her (Qu. 1)
pcr1i1.label_de: Sie zeigen Ihrem Kind mit Worten und Gesten, dass Sie es gerne haben (Frage 1)

pcr1i2.name: pcr1i2
pcr1i2.label: When your child makes new friends, you talk to him/her about them (Qu. 1)

pcr1i4.name: pcr1i4
pcr1i4.label: You lessen a punishment or end it early (Qu. 1)

pcr1i5.name: pcr1i5
pcr1i5.label: You cheer up your child when he/she is sad (Qu. 1)

pcr1i6.name: pcr1i6
pcr1i6.label: When your child goes out, you know exactly where he/she is (Qu. 1)

pcr1i7.name: pcr1i7
pcr1i7.label: You find it hard to set and keep consistent rules for your child (Qu. 1)

pcr1i8.name: pcr1i8
pcr1i8.label: You yell at your child because he/she did something wrong (Qu. 1)
pcr1i8.label_de: Sie schreien Ihr Kind an, wenn es etwas falsch gemacht hat (Frage 1)

pcr1i9.name: pcr1i9
pcr1i9.label: When your child goes out, you ask what he/she did and experienced (Qu. 1)
pcr1i9.label_de: Wenn Kind unterwegs war, fragen Sie nach, was es getan und erlebt hat (Frage 1)

pcr1i10.name: pcr1i10
pcr1i10.label: On some days you are stricter than on others (Qu. 1)
pcr1i10.label_de: Es gibt Tage, an denen Sie strenger sind als an anderen (Frage 1)

pcr1i11.name: pcr1i11
pcr1i11.label: You scold your child because you are angry at him/her (Qu. 1)

pcr1i12.name: pcr1i12
pcr1i12.label: When your child makes new friends, you get to know them soon thereafter (Qu. 1)
pcr1i12.label_de: Wenn Ihr Kind neue Freunde hat, lernen Sie sie auch bald kennen (Frage 1)

pcr1i13.name: pcr1i13
pcr1i13.label: You threaten child with a punishment but don't actually follow through (Qu. 1)
pcr1i13.label_de: Sie drohen Ihrem Kind eine Strafe an, strafen es dann aber doch nicht (Frage 1)

sdqpi1.name: sdqpi1
sdqpi1.label: SDQ: Considerate of other people's feelings (Qu. 2)

sdqpi2.name: sdqpi2
sdqpi2.label: SDQ: Restless, overactive, cannot stay still for long (Qu. 2)

sdqpi3.name: sdqpi3
sdqpi3.label: SDQ: Often complains of headaches, stomach-aches or sickness (Qu. 2)

sdqpi4.name: sdqpi4
sdqpi4.label: SDQ: Shares readily with other children/youth (treats, toys etc.) (Qu. 2)

sdqpi6.name: sdqpi6
sdqpi6.label: SDQ: Would rather be alone than with other children/youth (Qu. 2)

sdqpi7.name: sdqpi7
sdqpi7.label: SDQ: Generally well behaved, usually does what adults request (Qu. 2)
sdqpi7.label_de: SDQ: Im Allgemeinen folgsam; macht meist, was Erwachsene verlangen (Frage 2)

sdqpi8.name: sdqpi8
sdqpi8.label: SDQ: Many worries or often seems worried (Qu. 2)

sdqpi9.name: sdqpi9
sdqpi9.label: SDQ: Helpful if someone is hurt, upset or feeling ill (Qu. 2)

sdqpi11.name: sdqpi11
sdqpi11.label: SDQ: Has at least one good friend (Qu. 2)
sdqpi11.label_de: SDQ: Hat wenigstens einen guten Freund oder eine gute Freundin (Frage 2)

sdqpi12.name: sdqpi12
sdqpi12.label: SDQ: Often fights with other children/youth or bullies them (Qu. 2)
sdqpi12.label_de: SDQ: Streitet sich oft mit anderen Kindern oder schikaniert sie (Frage 2)

sdqpi13.name: sdqpi13
sdqpi13.label: SDQ: Often unhappy, depressed or tearful (Qu. 2)

sdqpi14.name: sdqpi14
sdqpi14.label: SDQ: Generally liked by other children/youth (Qu. 2)
sdqpi14.label_de: SDQ: Im Allgemeinen bei anderen Kindern beliebt (Frage 2)

sdqpi16.name: sdqpi16
sdqpi16.label: SDQ: Nervous in new situations, easily loses confidence (Qu. 2)

sdqpi19.name: sdqpi19
sdqpi19.label: SDQ: Picked on or bullied by other children/youth (Qu. 2)

sdqpi20.name: sdqpi20
sdqpi20.label: SDQ: Often offers to help others (parents, teachers, other children) (Qu. 2)
sdqpi20.label_de: SDQ: Hilft anderen oft freiwillig (Eltern, Lehrern, anderen Kindern) (Frage 2)

sdqpi21.name: sdqpi21
sdqpi21.label: SDQ: Thinks things out before acting (Qu. 2)
sdqpi21.label_de: SDQ: Denkt nach, bevor er/sie handelt (Frage 2)

sdqpi22.name: sdqpi22
sdqpi22.label: SDQ: Steals from home, school or elsewhere (Qu. 2)
sdqpi22.label_de: SDQ: Stiehlt zu Hause, in der Schule oder anderswo (Frage 2)

sdqpi23.name: sdqpi23
sdqpi23.label: SDQ: Gets along better with adults than with other children/youth (Qu. 2)
sdqpi23.label_de: SDQ: Kommt besser mit Erwachsenen aus als mit anderen Kindern (Frage 2)

sdqpi25.name: sdqpi25
sdqpi25.label: SDQ: Good attention span, sees work through to the end (Qu. 2)

pcr2i1.name: pcr2i1
pcr2i1.label: When my child disobeys and breaks rules, he/she just wants to annoy me (Qu. 3)

pcr2i2.name: pcr2i2
pcr2i2.label: If there are problems with way I raise my child, it's my child's fault (Qu. 3)
pcr2i2.label_de: Wenn es Probleme in der Erziehung gibt, liegt das an meinem Kind (Frage 3)

pcr2i3.name: pcr2i3
pcr2i3.label: It seems to me when my child misbehaves, he/she does it with purpose (Qu. 3)

pcr3i1.name: pcr3i1
pcr3i1.label: Your child tells you what he/she is thinking (Qu. 4)

pcr3i2.name: pcr3i2
pcr3i2.label: You show recognition for the things your child does (Qu. 4)
pcr3i2.label_de: Die Dinge, die Ihr Kind tut, werden von Ihnen anerkannt (Frage 4)

pcr3i3.name: pcr3i3
pcr3i3.label: Your child makes you do things his/her way (Qu. 4)
pcr3i3.label_de: Ihr Kind bringt Sie dazu, dass Sie sich nach ihm richten (Frage 4)

pcr3i4.name: pcr3i4
pcr3i4.label: You and your child are annoyed or angry with each other (Qu. 4)

pcr3i5.name: pcr3i5
pcr3i5.label: You show your child that you respect and like him/her (Qu. 4)
pcr3i5.label_de: Sie zeigen Ihrem Kind, dass Sie es gut finden (Frage 4)

pcr3i6.name: pcr3i6
pcr3i6.label: You and your child disagree and quarrel (Qu. 4)
pcr3i6.label_de: Sie und Ihr Kind sind unterschiedlicher Meinung und streiten sich (Frage 4)

pcr3i7.name: pcr3i7
pcr3i7.label: Your child gets his/her way when you can't agree on something (Qu. 4)

pcr3i8.name: pcr3i8
pcr3i8.label: Your child shares with you his/her feelings and thoughts (Qu. 4)

edu1.name: edu1
edu1.label: What educational certificate do you wish for your child? (Qu. 5)

labels: 3 Entrance qualification for universities (of applied sciences)

edu2.name: edu2
edu2.label: With what educational certificate is child likely to finish school? (Qu. 6)

labels: 3 Entrance qualification for universities (of applied sciences)

edu2.label_de: Mit welchem Schulabschluss wird Ihr Kind die Schule verlassen? (Frage 6)

edu3.name: edu3
edu3.label: How likely is it that your child will attend university? (Qu. 7)

edu4.name: edu4
edu4.label: How important is it to you that your child will attend university? (Qu. 8)

edu7i1.name: edu7i1
edu7i1.label: Learning support: Supporting or remedial courses (in school) (Qu. 9)

labels: 2 Yes, regularly for more than 3 months

edu7i2.name: edu7i2
edu7i2.label: Learning support: Courses for the gifted (in school) (Qu. 9)

labels: 2 Yes, regularly for more than 3 months
2 Yes, regularly for more than 3 months
2 Yes, regularly for more than 3 months
2 Yes, regularly for more than 3 months

edu8i1.name: edu8i1
edu8i1.label: Extra-curricular act.: Athletic club or group (Qu. 10)

edu8i2.name: edu8i2
edu8i2.label: Extra-curricular act.: Music school, music lessons, orchestra, or choir (Qu. 10)

edu8i3.name: edu8i3
edu8i3.label: Extra-curricular act.: Dance club, ballet school, dance group (Qu. 10)

edu8i5.name: edu8i5
edu8i5.label: Extra-curricular act.: Photography or film group (Qu. 10)

edu8i6.name: edu8i6
edu8i6.label: Extra-curricular act.: Computer club or course (Qu. 10)

edu8i7.name: edu8i7
edu8i7.label: Extra-curricular act.: Language course or language learning abroad (Qu. 10)

edu8i8.name: edu8i8
edu8i8.label: Extra-curricular act.: Painting or other art course (Qu. 10)

edu8i9.name: edu8i9
edu8i9.label: Extra-curricular act.: Scouting or similar group (Qu. 10)

edu8i10.name: edu8i10
edu8i10.label: Extra-curricular act.: Church or religious group (Qu. 10)

edu8i11.name: edu8i11
edu8i11.label: Extra-curricular act.: Club for the preservation of local culture (Qu. 10)

edu8i12.name: edu8i12
edu8i12.label: Extra-curricular act.: Other club or group, name (Qu. 10)

edu8i12o.name: edu8i12o
edu8i12o.label: Extra-curricular act.: Other club or group mentioned (Qu. 10)
edu8i12o.label_de: Sonstiger Verein oder Gruppe, und zwar: (Frage 10)

edu9i1.name: edu9i1
edu9i1.label: Total costs: Recurring costs - euros per month (Qu. 11)

edu9i2.name: edu9i2
edu9i2.label: Total costs: One-time or non-recurring costs - euros per year (Qu. 11)

edu9i3.name: edu9i3
edu9i3.label: Total costs: Activities were free of charge (Qu. 11)

edu9i4.name: edu9i4
edu9i4.label: Total costs: Don't know about such things (Qu. 11)

edu10i1.name: edu10i1
edu10i1.label: Help child with things (s)he has to do for school (I personally) (Qu. 12)

edu10i2.name: edu10i2
edu10i2.label: Help child with things (s)he has to do for school (other family member) (Qu. 12)

edu10i3.name: edu10i3
edu10i3.label: Ask child what s(he) learned in school (I personally) (Qu. 12)

edu10i4.name: edu10i4
edu10i4.label: Ask child what s(he) learned in school (other family member) (Qu. 12)

edu10i5.name: edu10i5
edu10i5.label: Check that child did his/her homework (I personally) (Qu. 12)

edu10i6.name: edu10i6
edu10i6.label: Check that child did his/her homework (other family member) (Qu. 12)
